Package cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.userinterface

Class UserInterfaceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.userinterface.UserInterfaceManager
  • public class UserInterfaceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserInterfaceManager class is responsible for updating and rendering all UI objects present in the game.

      Constructor of the UserInterfaceManager class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterfaceManager

        public UserInterfaceManager​(Handler handler)
        Constructor of the UserInterfaceManager class. It takes the game handler, for having access to all elements of the game, as a parameter. It also initializes the objects array.
        Parameters:
        handler - game handler for accessing other elements of the game

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates all objects in the objects array.

        public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws all objects from the objects array.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics instance on which the images are rendered

        Performs actions on mouse move on all objects from the objects array.

        Performs actions on mouse release on all objects from the objects array.
